message: I'm excited to offer you this great product at a competitive price. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Could you consider that?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $75. How about we meet in the middle at $85?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was really hoping to get closer to the $80 mark. Could you consider $82?
I'm getting close to the price I was thinking of, but I'm still not quite there. How about we meet at $87.50?
I'm getting close to accepting, but I think I can still get a better deal. How about $83?
